name: tmcs-anonymous
description: A PGP based anonymous IM platform.

scripts.build: npm run build:go && npm run build:www
scripts.build:go: export GOPATH=$PWD && cd src/tmcs-anonymous && go build
scripts.protoc: rm -r src/tmcs_msg && cd www/lib/tmcs-proto && npm run protoc:go && cp -r ./go/ ../../../src/tmcs_msg/
scripts.go-install: export GOPATH=$PWD && cd src/tmcs-anonymous && go get -v .

author: mdzz.studio
